title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.4 - Hitchhiking, loitering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.4 - Hitchhiking, loitering

State Regulations

No person shall hitchhike upon the vehicular crossing, nor
shall any person or persons congregate, stand, sit or loiter in or upon the
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5705.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
